title: [管理|安全]CommandLocker——给命令加个密码吧~[1.8]
author: 咕噜and呼噜
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 07:34 编辑 

用作者是原话就是这个插件可以帮助你，让你选择服务器命令安全！就是给命令上个密码锁，不解释






命令and权限
这个插件的基本命令是 /commandlocker 也可以用 /cl 
commandlocker.admin似乎是获得这个插件的所有权限
 命令 权限用处  /cl lock 命令 密码commandlocker.lock 给命令加个密码锁 /cl unlock 命令commandlocker.unlock 写完就可以用你刚刚写的指令啦~  /cl setpassword 
命令 密码 commandlocker.setpassword更改命令的密码锁  /cl help commandlocker.help显示commandlocker插件的
帮助 



配置文件[介绍什么的完全不会哟喂]

Setup.yml
//If you want all your passwords to be the same, set this to true
SamePasswords: false
//If the above is set to true, you can set the password for all here
Password: '1234567'
//The prefix of your command locker
Prefix: '&0[&3CommandLocker&0]&f '

CommandLocker.yml
//The message to send to ask the player to enter the password
EnterPasswordMessage: '&4Please enter the password!'
//Message to send when the player gets the wrong password
WrongPasswordMessage: '&4That is the wrong password!'
//Message to send when the player gets the right password
RightPasswordMessage: '&aSuccessfully Unlocked!'
//Do not mess with this! The In-Game commands will do this for you!
Locked:
- op
op:
  Password: '123'





下载地址:http://dev.bukkit.org/media/files/871/626/CommandLocker.jar

没人看的更新记录


R: CommandLocker Version 1.1.1 for 1.821 hours ago
R: CommandLocker Version 1.1 for 1.81 day ago
R: CommandLocker Version 1.0 for 1.8Mar 22, 2015

第一次去bukkit官网搬运插件，求打赏
